meanings.sent1: I preprogramed the coffee maker to start brewing at 7 AM.
meanings.sent2: The robot was preprogramed to perform a series of tasks.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed preprogramed to always find the warmest spot in the house.
meanings.sent4: Her instincts were like a preprogramed response to danger.
meanings.sent5: The students were preprogramed to raise their hands before speaking.

meanings.sent1: The preprogramed thermostat kept the house at a comfortable temperature.
meanings.sent2: The preprogramed message popped up on the screen as soon as she logged in.
meanings.sent3: The preprogramed alarm clock played a different song each morning.
meanings.sent4: His movements were as smooth and preprogramed as a well-rehearsed dance.
meanings.sent5: The preprogramed settings made the new device easy to use.
